title: What the Rams and the Patriots can't forget to pack for Super Bowl LIII
itunes:title: What the Rams and the Patriots can't forget to pack for Super Bowl LIII
description:
The "Good Morning Football" crew starts up the show with some 'Journalism 101' to determine who shall be declared the winner of Super Bowl Opening Night (:47). The gang then gets into '2-Point Conversing', where Nate Burleson and Peter Schrager agree to disagree on several topics surrounding the big game, including whose appearance in this Super Bowl is more impressive for their age - Tom Brady at 41 or Rams head coach Sean McVay at 33 (4:24), and whether or not another Super Bowl ring should make Julian Edelman a Hall of Famer (6:33). Lastly, former NFL cornerback DeAngelo Hall joins the crew to discuss what the Rams and Patriots each cannot forget to bring to Atlanta to win Super Bowl LIII (11:06). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
